text: visvasavantayini! yudevvanvada, kristiyanuvanvada, (obata) araksakayin (avliya) bavata pat kara noganu. (obata saturukam kirimehi) ovungen keneku anit kenata udavkaruvan vasayen sitinnaha. obagen kavurun ho ovunva (tamanta) araksakayin bavata pat kara gatahot niyata vasayenma ohuda ovungen vuveku vanneya. niyata vasayenma allah (mema) aparadhakara janatava (ovunge napuru kriyavanhi hetuven) rju margayehi Ã¦tulu nokaranneya
